sql: SELECT  PRINTF('%04d-%02d', "year", "month") AS yearMonth,  GBIF_EEARGCode(10000, decimalLatitude, decimalLongitude, COALESCE(coordinateUncertaintyInMeters, 1000)) AS eeaCellCode,  basisOfRecord,  datasetKey,  countryCode,  COUNT(*) AS occurrences FROM  occurrence WHERE occurrenceStatus = 'PRESENT'  AND continent = 'EUROPE'  AND speciesKey = 3048831  AND hasCoordinate = TRUE  AND NOT ARRAY_CONTAINS(issue, 'ZERO_COORDINATE')  AND NOT ARRAY_CONTAINS(issue, 'COORDINATE_OUT_OF_RANGE')  AND NOT ARRAY_CONTAINS(issue, 'COORDINATE_INVALID')  AND NOT ARRAY_CONTAINS(issue, 'COUNTRY_COORDINATE_MISMATCH') AND "month" IS NOT NULL GROUP BY yearMonth, eeaCellCode, basisOfRecord, datasetKey, countryCode ORDER BY  yearMonth DESC,  eeaCellCode ASC,  countryCode ASC
